title: Drawing, "Sketches of Sailing Boats, Cullercoats, England", 1881–82
medium: Graphite,brush and white gouache on gray-green paper
creditline: Gift of Charles Savage Homer, Jr.
description: Horizontal sketch showing twelve sailing boats and, inverted at bottom of sheet, one rowboat.  Three sketches of sails; one bottom left is inscribed twice: Shal.  Vessel drawn in upper right corner has in background ruin of Tynemouth Priory.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Sketches of Sailing Boats, Cullercoats, England", 1881–82.
1881–82. Graphite,brush and white gouache on gray-green paper. Gift of Charles Savage Homer, Jr.. 1912-12-194.
